D.title: Block light absorption 1.10.0
D.description: The amount of light this block will absorb.

E.title: Block light emission 1.10.0
E.description: The amount of light this block will emit in a range [0.0, 1.0].

F.title: Break on push 1.10.0
F.description: When pushed by a piston the block breaks.

G.title: Breathability 1.10.0
G.description: Property describing the breathability of this block and whether it is treated as a solid or as air.

H.title: Destroy time 1.10.0
H.description: Sets the destroy time property for the block. Greater numbers result in greater mining times.

I.title: Display name 1.10.0
I.description: Specifies the display name id for the block.

J.title: Entity collision 1.10.0
J.description: Can only be set to false, it disables the collision of the block with entities.

origin.title: Origin
origin.description: Minimal position Bounds of the collision box

size.title: Size
size.description: Size of each side of the box of the component

BA.title: Explosion resistance 1.10.0
BA.description: Sets the explosion resistance for this block.

BB.title: Flammable 1.10.0
BB.description: Describes the flammable properties for this block.

burn_odds.description: How likely the block will be destroyed by flames when on fire.
burn_odds.title: Burn odds

flame_odds.description: How likely the block will catch flame when next to a fire.
flame_odds.title: Flame odds

BC.title: Friction 1.10.0
BC.description: Property describing the friction for this block. Friction effects an entities movements when it walks on the block.

BD.title: Geometry 1.10.0
BD.description: The geometry definition name to use.

BE.title: Immovable 1.10.0
BE.description: An Immovable block cannot be pushed by pistons

BF.title: Loot 1.10.0
BF.description: The path of the loot table that this component will use when the block is destroyed.

BG.title: Map color 1.10.0
BG.description: A color represented as a hex value. This will be the color rendered to a map.

BH.title: Material instances 1.10.0
BH.description: Maps face or material_instance names in a geometry file to an actual material instance. Material instance can either be a full material instance or a name to another already defined instance

BI.title: Only piston push 1.10.0
BI.description: Blocks with those components won't stick to stickyPistons

BJ.title: Pick collision 1.10.0
BJ.description: Can only be set to false, it disables the collision of the block with entities

origin.title: Origin
origin.description: Minimal position Bounds of the collision box

size.title: Size
size.description: Size of each side of the box of the component

CA.title: Placement filter 1.10.0
CA.description: Sets rules for under what conditions the block can be placed/survive

conditions.title: Conditions
conditions.description: List of conditions where the block can be placed/survive

allowed_faces.title: Allowed faces
allowed_faces.description: List of any of the following strings: up, down, north, south, east, west, side, all

block_filter.title: Block filter
block_filter.description: List of blocks (can use tags to specify them) that this block can be placed against in the allowed_faces direction

CB.title: Prevents jumping 1.10.0
CB.description: This component makes it so actors can't jump when walking on this block

CC.title: Random ticking 1.10.0
CC.description: Describes the component that will trigger an even at a regular interval between two values

on_tick.title: On tick
on_tick.description: Describes the component that will trigger an even at a regular interval between two values

event.title: Event

CD.title: Rotation 1.10.0
CD.description: This is the block's rotation around the center of the cube in degrees. The rotation order is x-y-z.

CE.description: Describes the component that will trigger an even at a regular interval between two values

register_to_creative_menu.title: Register to creative menu
